md:
giải nghĩa từ "lifting" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Lifting (verb) : nâng, nâng lên, kéo lên
	+ Meaning: to move something upwards, or to make something lighter or more pleasant.
	+ Example: "She was lifting the heavy box onto the table."
	+ Related words: lift, raise, elevate, hoist
	+ Antonyms: lowering, dropping, falling

* Lifting (adjective) : nâng cao, khích lệ
	+ Meaning: giving someone confidence, hope, or encouragement.
	+ Example: "The lifting music filled the room with joy."
	+ Related words: uplifting, inspiring, heartening, encouraging
	+ Antonyms: depressing, discouraging, disheartening

* Lifting (noun) : sự nâng, sự kéo lên
	+ Meaning: the act of moving something upwards, or the state of being lifted.
	+ Example: "The lifting of the weights was a great exercise for her arms."
	+ Related words: lift, raise, elevation, hoist
	+ Antonyms: lowering, drop, fall
html:
giải nghĩa từ "lifting" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

  • Lifting (verb) : nâng, nâng lên, kéo lên

    • Meaning: to move something upwards, or to make something lighter or more pleasant.
    • Example: "She was lifting the heavy box onto the table."
    • Related words: lift, raise, elevate, hoist
    • Antonyms: lowering, dropping, falling

  • Lifting (adjective) : nâng cao, khích lệ

    • Meaning: giving someone confidence, hope, or encouragement.
    • Example: "The lifting music filled the room with joy."
    • Related words: uplifting, inspiring, heartening, encouraging
    • Antonyms: depressing, discouraging, disheartening

  • Lifting (noun) : sự nâng, sự kéo lên

    • Meaning: the act of moving something upwards, or the state of being lifted.
    • Example: "The lifting of the weights was a great exercise for her arms."
    • Related words: lift, raise, elevation, hoist
    • Antonyms: lowering, drop, fall
